      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              int startingBalance,
              java.lang.String color,
              int position,
              int playerID)
        Constructor for the Player class
        Parameters:
        name - the players name
        startingBalance - the amount of starting credits for a player
        color - the color type the player will display on the gameboard
        position - what field # the player is currently on
        PlayerID - ID to identify the player

        public int withdrawBalance(int value)
        Withdraws an amount from the players balance. If under 0, player is set to broke
        Parameters:
        value - The amount to withdraw.
        setisBroke - sets the player broke status to true or false
        See Also:
        depositBalance(int)
